text: Epipsestis peregovitsi is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Gyula M. László and Gábor Ronkay in 2000. It is found in Vietnam,László, Gy. M. & Ronkay, G. (2000). "New Epipsestis Matsumura, 1921 species (Lepidoptera, Thyatiridae) from Vietnam and from Nepal". Acta Zoologica Academiae Scientiarum Hungaricae. 46 (4): 337–349. Guangdong in China, Nepal and Thailand. ==References== Category:Thyatirinae Category:Moths described in 2000
title: Epipsestis peregovitsi
